'''28''' (''[[2008â2009 figure skating season|2008â2009]]'') |combined total= 222.42 |combined date= [[2011 World Figure Skating Championships|2011 Worlds]] |SP score= 70.54 |SP date= [[2011 World Figure Skating Championships|2011 Worlds]] |FS score= 151.88 |FS date= [[2011 World Figure Skating Championships|2011 Worlds]] |medaltemplates= {{MedalCountry| [[United States of America|United States]]}} {{MedalSport | Men's [[Figure Skating]]}} {{MedalCompetition|[[ISU Junior Grand Prix|Junior Grand Prix Final]]}} {{MedalGold|[[2010â2011 ISU Junior Grand Prix|2010â2011 Beijing]]|[[2010â2011 ISU Junior Grand Prix|Men's singles]]}} {{MedalBronze|[[2008â2009 ISU Junior Grand Prix|2008â2009 Goyang]]|[[2008â2009 ISU Junior Grand Prix|Men's singles]]}} }} '''Richard Dornbush''' (born August 27, 1991 in Corona, [[California]]) is an [[United States|American]] [[figure skater]]. He is the [[2010â2011 Grand Prix of Figure Skating Final|2010â11 Junior Grand Prix Final champion]] and 2011 [[2011 United States Figure Skating Championships|U.S. national silver medalist]]. == Career == Richard Dornbush has been coached by Tammy Gambill from a young age. He trains in [[Riverside, California]]. He was the [[2008â2009 Grand Prix of Figure Skating Final|2008â2009 Junior Grand Prix Final]] bronze medalist. He finished 11th at the [[2010 United States Figure Skating Championships|2010 U.S. Nationals]]. Dornbush was one of twenty young skaters to receive a scholarship from the [[Michael Weiss (figure skater)|Michael Weiss Foundation]]. During the 2010-11 season, Dornbush won the [[2010â2011 Grand Prix of Figure Skating Final|Junior Grand Prix Final]]. At the 2011 [[2011 United States Figure Skating Championships|U.S. Nationals]] he placed seventh in the short program and first in the long program to win the silver medal. He was selected to compete at the [[2011 World Figure Skating Championships|World Championships]], where he finished 9th. == Personal life == Dornbush played the violin for six years. == Programs == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
